verses.verse: A scroll of the birth of Jesus, the Anointed King, David's son, Abraham's son.
Abraham had a son, Isaac. Isaac had a son, Jacob. Jacob had several sons, Judah and his brothers.
Judah had two sons, Phares and Zerah, from Tamar. Phares had a son, Hezron. Hezron had a son, Aram.
Aram had a son, Aminadab. Aminadab had a son, Nahshon. Nahshon had a son, Salmon.
Salmon had a son, Boaz, from Rahab. Boaz had a son, Obed, from Ruth. Obed had a son, Jesse.
Jesse had a son, David, the king. David, the king, had a son, Solomon, from the widow of Uriah.
Solomon had a son, Rehoboam. Rehoboam had a son, Abijah. Abijah had a son, Asa.
Asa had a son, Jehoshaphat. Jehoshaphat had a son, Joram. Joram had a son, Uzziah.
Uzziah had a son, Jotham. Jotham had a son, Ahaz. Ahaz had a son, Hezekiah.
Hezekiah had a son, Manasseh. Manasseh had a son, Amon. Amon had a son, Josiah.
Josiah had several sons, Jeconiah and his brothers, at Babylon's relocation of Judeans.
After Babylon's relocation of Judeans, Jeconiah had a son, Shealtiel. Shealtiel had a son, Zerubbabel.
Zerubbabel had a son, Abiud. Abiud had a son, Eliakim. Eliakim had a son, Azor.
Azor had a son, Zadok. Zadok had a son, Achim. Achim had a son, Eliud.
Eliud had a son, Eleazar. Eleazar had a son, Matthan. Matthan had a son, Jacob.
Jacob had a son, Joseph, the husband of Mary, from whom was born, Jesus, the One who is called the Anointed King.

So all the generations from Abraham until David are fourteen generations. And from David until Babylon's relocation of Judeans are fourteen generations. And from Babylon's relocation of Judeans until the Anointed King are fourteen generations.

The birth of Jesus, the Anointed King, was like this: you see, when His mother Mary was engaged to Joseph, before the time for them to even come together, she was found having a baby in her womb from the Sacred Spirit.
Joseph, her husband, who did what is right and who did not want to make a public exhibit of her, intended to dismiss her in an unnoticed way.

When he contemplated these things, look, an angel of the Master appeared to him throughout a dream, saying, "Joseph, son of David, you should not be afraid to take along Mary, your wife. You see, what is born in her is from the Sacred Spirit.
She will deliver a son, and you will call His name Jesus. You see, He will rescue His ethnic group from their sins."
This whole thing had happened so that what was stated by the Master through the preacher (in Isaiah 7:14) might be accomplished that says,
"Look, the virgin will have a baby in her womb and deliver a son. And they will call His name Immanuel, that is translated from Hebrew as 'God with us'."
When Joseph was wide awake from the slumber, he did as the angel of the Master instructed him, and he took his wife along.
And he was not knowing her until the time that she delivered her son, the firstborn one. And he called His name Jesus.
